entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 04:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -33

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm in areas south of Fort McMurray. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
